Name: Project_larynx
Acknowledgements:
N.E. is a Wellcome Trust Doctoral student in Neuroscience at the University of Oxford [203730/Z/16/Z]. The project was supported by the NIHR Oxford Health Biomedical Research Centre. The Wellcome Centre for Integrative Neuroimaging is supported by core funding from the Wellcome Trust [203139/Z/16/Z]. 
Data in this repository has been used in multiple projects that involved different collaborators. For project-specific acknowledgements, please refer to the relevant references.
HowToAcknowledge:
Data in this repository has been used in multiple projects.
When using this dataset, please consider including the following message: 'This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database. Its accession number is ds002634'.
,When using the data in the subfolders /anat and /dwi, please cite this paper: Eichert et al. 2020, eLife 2020;9:e53232.
When using the data in the subfolders /func, /beh and /mpm, please cite this paper: Eichert et al. 2020, Cerebral Cortex, https://doi.org/10.1093/cercor/bhaa182.
